text: Sano awala waakufuulu watite: “Ngasin’jipikanila aji Qur’aniji, soni n’jitendeleje masegwe (ndema jajikusoomedwa) kuti mwine m’be wakupunda.” Basi chisimu chene chitwape kupasya awala waakufuulu ilagasyo yaukali nnope, ni chitwalipile kwene malipilo gakusakala nnope, ligongo lya itendo yao yangalumbana yawaliji nkupanganya
